bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I make honey.
💛 I am yellow and black.
🌸 I collect pollen.

bug.question: I have many legs and crawl. I can be red or black and live in a colony. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I carry food.
🏘️ I live in the ground.
💪 I am very strong for my size.

bug.question: I hop around and eat plants. I have long back legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to eat grass.
🟢 I am often green.
🦗 I make a chirping sound.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then grow wings. I am very colorful. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I fly around in the daytime.
🌈 I can have many colors on my wings.
🐛 I used to crawl before I could fly.

bug.question: I am a small, round bug, often red with black spots. I am considered lucky! What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 Farmers are happy to see me in their gardens.
⚫ I have spots.
🟢 I like to eat aphids that are on plants.

bug.question: I like to bite and suck blood, and I can be very annoying at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I make a buzzing sound near your ear.
🩸 I need blood to live
🌃 I often come out when it's dark.

bug.question: I build a sticky web to catch other bugs for my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🪰 I catch flies for food.

bug.question: I am a bug that glows in the dark. You can see me on summer nights. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I light up.
🌙 I am most active at night.
💡 I am sometimes called a lightning bug.

bug.question: I am a bug that makes a loud noise by rubbing my wings together. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I chirp in the summer.
🌳 I live in trees.
☀️ I am often heard during the day when it is warm.

bug.question: I am a bug that eats wood and can cause damage to houses. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I like to eat wood.
🏘️ I can be found in houses.
🐜 I live in colonies but I'm not an ant.

transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. People sit inside and go places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I usually have four wheels.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Families often use me.
🔑 You need a key to start me.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am much bigger than a bird.
✈️ I have wings and an engine.
🌍 I can take you to another country.

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry lots of people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🚂 I have many carriages.
🚦 I stop at stations.
📣 I make a loud noise when I arrive.

transport.question: I float on the water. Sometimes I'm big and carry cars and people.

hints.text: 🌊 I don't need roads.
⚓️ I often have an anchor.
🛥️ You can go on me on a lake, river, or ocean.

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you use your feet to make me go.

hints.text: 👧 I am fun for kids to ride.
🚴 I need you to pedal.
⛑️ It's important to wear a helmet when using me.

transport.question: I am a car that you can wave down and I will take you somewhere for money.

hints.text: 🚖 I often have a light on top.
💰 You pay me to drive you.
📍 I can take you anywhere you want in the city.

transport.question: I can fly, but I don't have wings like an airplane. I have a spinning blade on top.

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
🚨 Police and rescuers sometimes use me.
⬆️ I take off and land vertically.

transport.question: I'm a special car that goes very fast to help people who are sick or hurt.

hints.text: 🚑 I have flashing lights and a siren.
🩺 I take people to the hospital.
🚨 I am painted in white and sometimes in yellow.

transport.question: I travel under the city, carrying many passengers from station to station.

hints.text: 🚇 I am a type of train.
🌃 You can use me to avoid traffic.
🌎 You can find me in big cities.

transport.question: I am a very big boat that can carry many cars and people across the water.

hints.text: 🚢 I am bigger than a regular boat.
🌊 I travel long distances, sometimes across oceans.
🚗 You can drive your car onto me.
